comment.author: 35133216@N05
comment._content: Please correct to North-American B-25D-NC Mitchell USAAF 41-29789 "Baby Shoes" force landed on coast some distance north of Price Cristian-Sund, Greenland (Position 6025N/4316W), May 2, 1943. The four crew was resuced by USCG Cutter (here two of them cutter crew with air-crew?)
